hero.headline: I Teach Programming that Makes Sense.

projectsDescription: Courses and subjects I currently teach at educational institutions.
ctaTitle: Looking for an educator for your institution?

subjects.desc1: Programming fundamentals, logic, data structures and algorithms. Python and pseudocode for beginners.
subjects.desc2: Database design, SQL, ER modeling, normalization. PostgreSQL, MySQL and NoSQL concepts.
subjects.desc3: Real projects with agile methodologies. Git, teamwork, documentation and project presentation.
subjects.desc4: Practical Artificial Intelligence. Prompt Engineering, LLM APIs, n8n automations and real use cases.
